idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.0.3348

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

overview.eaover:
A standard set of attribute fields is included for each county. The attributes are identical for the point and polygon datasets. Not all attributes fields are populated by each county.
A list of the attribute names is shown below. Detailed information about the attributes can be found at: http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/MetroGIS_Regional_Parcels_Attributes.pdf
Field Name: Brief Description ------------- -------------------- COUNTY_ID: Unique County ID
PIN: Unique Parcel ID
BLDG_NUM: House Number PREFIX_DIR: Street Prefix Direction PREFIXTYPE: Street Prefix Type STREETNAME: Street Name STREETTYPE: Street Type SUFFIX_DIR: Street Suffix Direction UNIT_INFO: Unit Information
CITY: City (actual) CITY_USPS: City (mailing)
ZIP: ZIP Code ZIP4: ZIP 4 Extension
PLAT_NAME: Legal Description Plat Name BLOCK: Legal Description Block LOT: Legal Description Lot
ACRES_POLY: Polygon Acreage ACRES_DEED: Deeded Acreage
USE1_DESC: Use Type 1 USE2_DESC: Use Type 2 USE3_DESC: Use Type 3 USE4_DESC: Use Type 4
MULTI_USES: Multiple Uses
LANDMARK: Landmark/Business Name
OWNER_NAME: Owner Name OWNER_MORE: Additional Owner Name
OWN_ADD_L1: Owner Address Line 1 OWN_ADD_L2: Owner Address Line 2 OWN_ADD_L3 Owner Address Line 3
TAX_NAME: Taxpayer Name
TAX_ADD_L1: Taxpayer Address Line 1 TAX_ADD_L2: Taxpayer Address Line 2 TAX_ADD_L3: Taxpayer Address Line 3
HOMESTEAD: Homestead Status
EMV_LAND: Est. Market Value - Land EMV_BLDG: Est. Market Value - Buildings EMV_TOTAL: Est. Market Value - Total
TAX_CAPAC: Tax Capacity TOTAL_TAX: Total Tax
SPEC_ASSES: Special Assessments
TAX_EXEMPT: Tax Exempt Status
XUSE1_DESC: Exempt Use 1 XUSE2_DESC: Exempt Use 2 XUSE3_DESC: Exempt Use 3 XUSE4_DESC: Exempt Use 4
DWELL_TYPE: Dwelling Type HOME_STYLE: Home Style FIN_SQ_FT: Square Footage
GARAGE: Garage Y/N GARAGESQFT: Garage Square Footage
BASEMENT: Basement Y/N
HEATING: Heating type COOLING: Cooling type
YEAR_BUILT: Year Built
NUM_UNITS: Number of Units
SALE_DATE: Last Sales Date SALE_VALUE: Last Sales Value
SCHOOL_DST: School District WSHD_DIST: Watershed District
GREEN_ACRE: Green Acres OPEN_SPACE: Open Space AG_PRESERV: Agricultural Preserve AGPRE_ENRD: Ag. Preserve Enrolled AGPRE_EXPD: Ag. Preserve Expiration
PARC_CODE: Parcel Polygon to Parcel Point and PIN Relationship Code
overview.eadetcit:
A detailed description of the attributes available in this dataset can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/MetroGIS_Regional_Parcels_Attributes.pdf
Note: The last five digits of Dakota Counties PIN Numbers changed format in March of 2011 See .pdf above for further details.
A lookup table "ParcelsDakotaOldNewPINLookupTable2011.dbf" will be included in the Dakota County zip bundle that allows users to join parcel information which contain the old PIN format. Users should be aware that the old and new PIN formats are not mutually exclusive to each other. There are approximately 1,500 records of NEWPIN numbers that have the same PIN as OLDPIN number.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
